TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示可以讀取和寫入金鑰識別碼、金鑰識別碼子句及安全性權杖的類別。

span.span: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別，以 XML 的格式讀取和寫入 、 和 類別。Use the class to read and write , , and classes as XML. 類別有一些方法，可以判定這個類別是否能讀取和寫入這些實體 (Entity) 並實際加以讀取和寫入。The class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them. 如果要用於安全性權杖，這些方法是 、、 和 。For security tokens, these methods are , , , and .
